sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT L2_switch_type
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a JOIN
dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id=b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name='@(pipeline().parameters.Trigger)'

SELECT DISTINCT L3_switch_type
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a JOIN
dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id=b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name='@(pipeline().parameters.Trigger)'

SELECT DISTINCT L3_switch_type
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a JOIN
dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id=b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name='@(pipeline().parameters.Trigger)'
